name: Overburdened
description:
Overburdened

Since the dawn of time, gamers have been conditioned to collect coins. Conditioned to worship these shining, golden demons who hold us back from our true potential. But no more. Now we must break the mold. Avoid coins, do not let greed keep you from your goals. In this game, coins are your enemy...

Controls

  • W and D to move

  • Space to jump
